content: blue sky fibers complimentary pattern lyle cap design by nancy ekvall no 1803 mineral bath color shown experience level - advanced beginner materials - eco-cashmere 50% recycled cashmere 50% virgin cashmere 50g/164yds 1 hank - size 7 4 5mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - size 7 4 5mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge - stitch marker - tapestry needle sizes - one finished measurements - circumference 19 - height 9 gauge - in stockinette 21 sts and 30 row = 4 abbreviations co cast on k knit lyle cap no 201827 k1tbl knit 1 stitch through the back loop k2tog knit two together design by nancy ekvall pattern meas measure p purl knit with one hank of eco-cashmere the lyle cap is extremely pm place marker soft and available in eight exquisite colors a great style for both men and women this cap is a wonderful advanced rem remaining beginner project repeat repeat round round st s stitch s * repeat the directions between the asterisks as many times as indicated notes change to double-pointed needles when stitches no longer fit comfortably on circular needle blue sky fibers complimentary pattern cap co 100 sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts pm to mark start of round rnds 1 5 *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round round 6 k next round repeat round 6 until piece meas 7 ½ from co crown decrease round 1 *k2tog k8 repeat from * to end of round 90 sts round 2 k round 3 *k2tog k7 repeat from * to end of round 80 sts round 4 k round 5 *k2tog k6 repeat from * to end of round 70 sts round 6 *k2tog k5 repeat from * to end of round 60 sts round 7 *k2tog k4 repeat from * to end of round 50 sts round 8 *k2tog k3 repeat from * to end of round 40 sts round 9 *k2tog k2 repeat from * to end of round 30 sts round 10 *k2tog k1 repeat from * to end of round 20 sts round 11 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 10 sts round 12 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 5 sts cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull gently to close finishing weave in ends block as desired care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store your
